title: What increases CA deficit in US

content.question: Which of the following is most likely to increase the current account deficit in the United States?

choices.label: An increase in real interest rates in the United States relative to other countries
An increase in the deficit of the United States capital and financial account
An increase in United States exports
A decrease in labor costs in the United States relative to other countries
A decrease in the amount of money borrowed by the United States Treasury

content.answer: An increase in real interest rates in the United States relative to other countries

unit.text: 6: Open Economy - International Trade and Finance

skill.text: Skill 2.A: Using economic concepts, principles, or models, explain how a specific economic outcome occurs, or what action should be taken in order to achieve a specific economic outcome.
